Welcome To The Hop!
Asheville Ice Cream, Events and Parties

Welcome!

About

The Hop Ice Cream Cafe has proudly been serving Asheville, NC since 1978 with premium quality homemade Dairy and Vegan Ice Cream, Fair trade Coffee and Espresso, unique speciality desserts and more. In addition we host a variety of Birthday Parties, free family friendly entertainment, and special events at each of our 3 Asheville locations.

Press

Named by Huffington Post and Domino Magazine as one of the 12 Best Ice Cream Shops in America. Featured on the Cooking Channel show Unique Sweets about Awesome Asheville Sweets (video coming soon). Blueberry Kale Ice Cream made Saveur Magazine’s 5 Great American Ice Creams.

Family-Owned

Ashley and Greg Garrison

Events

Parties

Host your next event at one of our Asheville locations!

Ice Cream Cakes

We make ice cream cakes from scratch to order with a variety of custom decorative options. Check out our Specialty Deserts Menu for more details!

Birthday Parties

We host birthday parties with a variety of food and activity options. Click here to see our different packages and prices.

Catering

Serving Weddings and Group Celebrations, Employee Appreciation Parties, Outdoor Gatherings and more. Call us at 828.254.2224 for more information.
